com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer

Interface CircularBufferProducer<S,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The source type.
    T - The target type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LockFreeCircularBufferProducer, LockingCircularBufferProducer

    public interface CircularBufferProducer<S,T>
    Interface for inserting elements into a CircularBuffer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <R> R offer(S source, Movable<S,T,R> movable)
      Attempt to put an element into a CircularBuffer if there is spare capacity.
      <R> R put(S source, Movable<S,T,R> movable)
      Put an element into a CircularBuffer.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        <R> R put(S source,
          Movable<S,T,R> movable)
   throws InterruptedException
        Put an element into a CircularBuffer.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The return type.
        Parameters:
        source - The source object.
        movable - The object responsible for moving the source object into a circular buffer element.
        Returns:
        The move result.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - On being interrupted while awaiting a free entry or committing the element.

      • offer

        <R> R offer(S source,
            Movable<S,T,R> movable)
     throws InterruptedException
        Attempt to put an element into a CircularBuffer if there is spare capacity.

        This method never blocks awaiting spare capacity.

        Type Parameters:
        R - The return type.
        Parameters:
        source - The source object.
        movable - The object responsible for moving the source object into a circular buffer element.
        Returns:
        The move result if the element was put into the buffer, null otherwise.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - On being interrupted while committing the element.
